Token.Abstract: The base class of view snapshotting tests. If you have small UI component, it's often easier to configure it in a test and compare an image of the view to a reference image that write lots of complex layout-code tests.
When YES, the test macros will save reference images, rather than performing an actual test.
When YES, the test macros will save reference images, rather than performing an actual test.
When YES, the test macros will save reference images, rather than performing an actual test.
When @c YES appends the name of the device model and OS to the snapshot file name. The default value is @c NO.
When @c YES appends the name of the device model and OS to the snapshot file name. The default value is @c NO.
When @c YES appends the name of the device model and OS to the snapshot file name. The default value is @c NO.

When YES, renders a snapshot of the complete view hierarchy as visible onscreen. There are several things that do not work if renderInContext: is used. - UIVisualEffect #70 - UIAppearance #91 - Size Classes #92

When YES, renders a snapshot of the complete view hierarchy as visible onscreen. There are several things that do not work if renderInContext: is used. - UIVisualEffect #70 - UIAppearance #91 - Size Classes #92

When YES, renders a snapshot of the complete view hierarchy as visible onscreen. There are several things that do not work if renderInContext: is used. - UIVisualEffect #70 - UIAppearance #91 - Size Classes #92
Performs the comparison or records a snapshot of the layer if recordMode is YES.

Parameter.Name: viewOrLayer
Parameter.Abstract: The UIView or CALayer to snapshot

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: An optional identifier, used if there are multiple snapshot tests in a given -test method.

Parameter.Name: suffixes
Parameter.Abstract: An NSOrderedSet of strings for the different suffixes

Parameter.Name: tolerance
Parameter.Abstract: The percentage difference to still count as identical - 0 mean pixel perfect, 1 means I don't care

ReturnValue.Abstract: nil if the comparison (or saving of the reference image) succeeded. Otherwise it contains an error description.

Token.Abstract: Performs the comparison or records a snapshot of the layer if recordMode is YES.

Parameter.Name: referenceImagesDirectory
Parameter.Abstract: The directory in which reference images are stored.

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: An optional identifier, used if there are multiple snapshot tests in a given -test method.

Parameter.Name: tolerance
Parameter.Abstract: The percentage difference to still count as identical - 0 mean pixel perfect, 1 means I don't care

Parameter.Name: errorPtr
Parameter.Abstract: An error to log in an XCTAssert() macro if the method fails (missing reference image, images differ, etc).

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the comparison (or saving of the reference image) succeeded.

Token.Abstract: Performs the comparison or records a snapshot of the view if recordMode is YES.

Parameter.Name: referenceImagesDirectory
Parameter.Abstract: The directory in which reference images are stored.

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: An optional identifier, used if there are multiple snapshot tests in a given -test method.

Parameter.Name: tolerance
Parameter.Abstract: The percentage difference to still count as identical - 0 mean pixel perfect, 1 means I don't care

Parameter.Name: errorPtr
Parameter.Abstract: An error to log in an XCTAssert() macro if the method fails (missing reference image, images differ, etc).

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the comparison (or saving of the reference image) succeeded.

Token.Abstract: Checks if reference image with identifier based name exists in the reference images directory.

Parameter.Name: referenceImagesDirectory
Parameter.Abstract: The directory in which reference images are stored.

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: An optional identifier, used if there are multiple snapshot tests in a given -test method.

Parameter.Name: errorPtr
Parameter.Abstract: An error to log in an XCTAssert() macro if the method fails (missing reference image, images differ, etc).

Parameter.Name: dir
Parameter.Abstract: directory to use if environment variable not specified. Ignored if null or empty.
